column4: you need to install a window decorator compiz supports, like metacity

Gnome is slow to load and I keep finding gnome-settings-daemon doing disk IO for no reason that I can tell. I don't lack for memory, cpu or gpu, so it's not exactly that I want *light*, but I want non-broken.
activate the desktowp switcher plugin in compiz
I see no plugin called that. I use rotate cube.
